Engineering colleges have come a long way back a decade and are totally in line with the wants and expectations of both the students and the industry. Maharashtra has some of the best engineering colleges in Mumbai. One such university which caters all the needs and expectations of students is Amity University, Mumbai. I would recommend this University. Simple technological awareness of one's core engineering domain won't be enough to be effective in today's multi-dimensional environment. Personality and social skills as well as your academic knowledge are equally essential to your progress. Best Engineering colleges therefore need to inculcate an academic culture which also addresses these needs Amity University Mumbai, as one among the best engineering colleges in Mumbai, offers these B.Tech/ masters courses with the main objective to create competent professionals for the fast-developing business and growing service sector in India. Placements: Placements are good! The CRC conducts different seminars and workshops with the HR Team of different recruiters. Most students get placed in a good position except the ones aiming for higher studies. Students get placement assistance from the placement cell CRC. Students at Amity University, Mumbai get internship opportunities as well. They invite organizations for guest lectures, internships and placements. Almost 90% students get placed and also there is an opportunity to do internships between semester breaks to provide you with inclusive development and understanding of the work atmosphere, and it helps you to choose your field of interest. Its boost the confidence level. Faculty: Teachers here are highly qualified and have good knowledge. They give extra time to students. Whenever students face problems at any time, they help students and teach them. Best faculty members are available on our campus. The curriculum is relevant to the course, and it makes students ready for different industries to work in. Infrastructure: Amity University Mumbai campus has spacious, amphitheater styled and air-conditioned classrooms that provide the most conducive atmosphere for dynamic and focused learning. These classrooms have been designed to bring together analysis with action and are improved with joined audio-visual teaching aids for lectures and presentations. It is a ragging-free university. Amity's libraries have a range of more than a lakh books, periodicals, guides and ample online journals. The on-campus AC and non-AC hostels are also provided to students. The well-appointed rooms are well lit and well ventilated. There are 1000 plus, separate hostels for girls and boys (more in line) which have strict discipline rules, ensuring safety for all students. The university ensures 24 hour water and power supply. Scholarship Facilities: There are various scholarship facilities, available after10+2. 100% scholarship - 93% or above (excluding Physical Education/ Fine Arts/ Performing Arts/ vocational/ non written subjects) in CBSE / ISC / any state boards class 12 50% scholarship – 90% aggregate and above (excluding Physical Education/ Fine Arts/ Performing Arts/ vocational/ non written subjects) and 25% - 75% aggregate and above (excluding Physical Education/ Fine Arts/ Performing Arts/ vocational/ non written subjects) in class 12. Course Curriculum Overview It is comprised semesters. The curriculum is fairly structured and at par with global standards. Good teachers one can get around. Here the course curriculum is up to the mark. Course curriculum followed here is carefully designed keeping in mind the reasonable and applied world. Two types of exams are conducted per semester. The 3 year course has in total 6 semesters. Each semester comprises of (mid and end semester) exams. Sports Facilities – The University has sprawling sports facility with both outdoor fields like cricket badminton, etc and indoor games. Cafeteria and Eating joints – These are on-campus and offer multiple cuisine along with ATMs, salon, laundry etc. Others/ Campus Life: Seniors are very helpful and accommodating. It has really good internal and external exams system. Events and fests are held every year for different cultural programs. If you want to enjoy the college life as well as quality study environment, go for it. The social environment does matters. Remarks: AMITY University Mumbai, as my choice, given these facilities and opportunities. In such short time of establishment it had really come out with achievements which is at par with other best engineering colleges.
